name: CAL HEIDELBERG, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Heidelberg v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: CAL HEIDELBERG, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of February, 2004, the above appeal is quashed for failure to file a conforming jurisdictional statement. Rule 909(d), Pa.R.A.P.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
843 A.2d 1222
CAL HEIDELBERG, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 2, 2004.
